name: orbiting-circles
description: A collection of circles which move in orbit along a circular path

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for each orbiting item

props.name: reverse
props.description: Whether to reverse the orbit direction

props.name: duration
props.description: Base duration of one full orbit in seconds

props.name: radius
props.description: Radius of the orbital path in pixels

props.name: path
props.description: Whether to render the circular orbit path

props.name: iconSize
props.description: Size of each orbiting icon container in pixels

props.name: speed
props.description: Speed multiplier for the orbit animation
